data.lyric:
[ti:Up Down]
[ar:Morgan Wallen/Florida Georgia Line]
[al:Morgan Wallen]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Up Down - Morgan Wallen/Florida Georgia Line
[00:05.33]Written by：Clawson Brad/Hardy Michael/Solar CJ
[00:10.66]Producer：Joey Moi
[00:15.99]Was Friday after five I got here just in time
[00:19.24]Went ahead and wet a line 'fore I went and lost my mind
[00:22.75]I ain't been here long but the bobbers in the pond
[00:26.45]Going up down up down up down
[00:30.44]Tonight we're gonna raise a whole lot more than Cain
[00:33.90]'Cause there's money in the bank and tomorrow's Saturday
[00:37.44]So if they pass that fifth of Jack this way
[00:41.28]I turn it up down up down up down
[00:45.42]
[00:45.98]We just holding it down here in BFE
[00:49.58]Still rolling around with a burnt CD
[00:53.44]Free Bird five minutes deep
[00:55.53]Head bobbing up down up down up down
[00:59.84]
[01:00.57]We got what we got we don't need the rest
[01:04.14]Can turn this parking lot into a party
[01:07.26]With an ice chest dancing cold beer
[01:10.03]Man we live it up down up down
[01:13.64]We live it up down here
[01:16.37]
[01:21.78]Yeah the girls they hit the spot get hotter when it's hot
[01:25.48]If you can't buy her a yacht but still proud of what you got
[01:29.24]'Cause when the day's done red neck is from the sun
[01:32.99]Going up down up down up down
[01:37.52]We just holding it down here in BFE
[01:41.10]Still rolling around with a burnt CD
[01:45.06]Free Bird five minutes deep
[01:47.92]Head bobbing up down up down up down
[01:51.47]
[01:52.22]We got what we got we don't need the rest
[01:55.77]Can turn this parking lot into a party
[01:58.87]With an ice chest dancing cold beer
[02:01.81]Man we live it up down up down
[02:05.35]We live it up down here
[02:08.05]
[02:21.00]Somebody pass that fifth of Cap this way
[02:24.56]I'll turn it up down up down up down
[02:29.24]We just holding it down here in BFE
[02:32.73]Still rolling around with a burnt CD
[02:36.66]Free Bird five minutes deep
[02:39.04]Head bobbing up down up down up down
[02:43.15]
[02:43.91]We got what we got we don't need the rest
[02:47.41]Can turn this parking lot into a party
[02:50.45]With an ice chest dancing cold beer
[02:53.44]Man we live it up down up down
[02:57.01]We live it up down here
data.trans:
[ti:Up Down]
[ar:Morgan Wallen/Florida Georgia Line]
[al:Morgan Wallen]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.05]//
[00:10.10]//
[00:15.16]周五晚上，我准时来到这个聚会
[00:18.41]一直向前走，渐渐地思绪飘了起来
[00:21.92]我在这里待了很久，却还是不懂泳池里的那些人
[00:25.62]他们肆意嬉戏，玩闹
[00:29.60]今晚注定是一个不眠之夜
[00:33.07]因为大家都手头富足，而且明天还是周末，不用上班
[00:36.61]如果女孩们把那些平庸的男孩都淘汰了
[00:40.44]那我的出现一定会让现场气氛更加热烈
[00:44.58]
[00:45.15]我们只需拥抱这一刻
[00:48.75]CD放着，我们摇晃着身体
[00:52.61]一首歌慢慢悠悠的放了5分钟
[00:54.70]人们跟随着音乐摆动着身躯
[00:59.00]
[00:59.74]生命中所需要的东西，现在都得到了
[01:03.31]有大冰柜，冰啤酒和舞蹈
[01:06.43]我们来将这停车场变成狂欢的派对现场吧
[01:09.20]朋友们 尽情的享受现在吧
[01:12.81]享受这一刻
[01:15.54]
[01:20.95]女孩们看起来更加性感美丽
[01:24.64]就算你送她的礼物并不那么名贵，她也会高兴地到处炫耀
[01:28.41]因为生活还是要继续，每天都会有阳光
[01:32.16]生活有起有落
[01:36.69]我们只需拥抱现在
[01:40.26] CD放着，我们摇晃着身体
[01:44.23]歌曲美妙
[01:47.09]人们随着音乐起舞
[01:50.64]
[01:51.38]好像这样就别无他求了
[01:54.94]有大冰柜，冰啤酒，舞蹈
[01:58.04]我们将这停车场变成狂欢的派对现场吧
[02:00.98]朋友们 尽情地享受现在吧
[02:04.52]享受这一刻
[02:07.21]
[02:20.16]如果女孩们把那些平庸的男孩都淘汰了
[02:23.73]那我的出现一定会让现场气氛更加热烈
[02:28.40]我们只需拥抱这一刻
[02:31.90]CD放着，我们摇晃着身体
[02:35.83]歌曲悠扬
[02:38.21]人们随着音乐起舞
[02:42.32]
[02:43.08]好像这样就已别无他求
[02:46.58]有大冰柜，冰啤酒，舞蹈
[02:49.62]我们来将这停车场变成狂欢的派对现场吧
[02:52.61]朋友们 享受现在吧
[02:56.18]尽情享受这一刻
